name: parasite paradise
description:
imagine:

you're a poor little parasite locked up in a scary laboratory and all those stupid scientist want to screw you up with experiments?

well then it's time to fight!

go and escape from the laboratory in our little game parasite paradise.

to successfully escape you'll have to take over the scientist and interact with your surrounding. but be careful that no one will catch you!

controlls
